contest-event.event-date: Jan. 31, 1971 D Durham League Contest (Section A) Durham League Contest (Section A) 10 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-a The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow. (4barsrest news article) Resurgam Spennymoor Town Hall, Spennymoor, County Durham, England, UK 9 bands competed. Prizes - 1st £18 and trophy, 2nd £10 and cup, 3rd £5. 9 bands competed. April 18, 2013, 12:48 p.m. Jan. 20, 2017, 10:05 a.m. 1 Crookhall Colliery Jack Nightingale 2 Dawdon Lodge Stan MacDonald 3 Westoe Band John Carr 4 Consett-Whitbread Trophy George Holden 5 Reg Vardy Band Eric Cunningham Unknown Result Washington Welfare George Rowell Unknown Result BHK (UK) Horden Band W.
